subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: The Lady Vols, who have won six national championships, have always been the first hoops team on the marquee in Knoxville. But men’s Coach Bruce Pearl is trying to change that.
snippet: The Lady Vols, who have won six national championships, have always been the first hoops team on the marquee in Knoxville. But men’s Coach Bruce Pearl is trying to change that.
